disputesClaimsPara.text: When your order arrives, please inspect the carton for any damage that may have occurred during shipping. It is normal for the shipping carton to show some wear and tear; however, you are responsible for promptly contacting Soins Karismä online customer service regarding any claim for damaged and/or lost shipments. Have you received any damaged products? Please contact help@soinskarisma.com

howCanConnectPara.text: Customers should contact Soins Karismä at help@soinskarisma.com
